trans-unit.source: Represents the removal of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> from a workflow during dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: Representa a remoção de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> de um fluxo de trabalho durante a atualização dinâmica.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been removed during a dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe pode ser usada por um serviço de controle para determinar qual <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s foram removidos durante a atualização dinâmica.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object is generated for every <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> that is removed (that is, that existed in the workflow prior to this dynamic update, but is gone afterward).
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do objeto é gerada para cada <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> que está sendo removido (ou seja, que existia no fluxo de trabalho antes dessa atualização dinâmica, mas não existe mais posteriormente).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction" />.

trans-unit.source: The condition removed from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: A condição removida do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction" /> class by using the definition of the removed condition.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction" /> usando a definição da condição removida.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="addedConditionDefinition" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addedConditionDefinition" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> a ser removida do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> para remover do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction.ConditionDefinition" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="Nothing" /> é uma referência nula (<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction.ConditionDefinition" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> a ser removida do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> para remover do fluxo de trabalho.
